rooms.name: Starting Room
rooms.description:
You enter a small dark room to with 2 doors, one to the south and one to the east. 
 In the centre of the room is a table with a small tinderbox
objectDescript: a small box of tinder, good for starting fires

rooms.name: Second Room
objectDescript: a small red ruby, quite valuable you reckon

rooms.name: Third Room
objectDescript: A delicate china cup with an exquisite design

rooms.name: fourth Room
objectDescript: Leather pouch containing tea leaves. Smells delicious!
